attributes.action: Prevent Mp being paid a disproportionate amount and Prevent Mp's voting to give themselve's a pay rise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mp's a paid far to highly for their services. The money spent on paying Mp's could go to many other worthy causes such as saving our floundering health service. There is no need for this kind of salary. They repeatedly vote to give themselve pay rises, surely this should be regulated by some other body?

rejection.details: There are several petitions on this theme, for example http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/cut-mp-salaries/ and http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MP-salary/ Please consider signing one of these before opening a new petition.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
